    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static byte getShiftAmount​(int n)
      If n is a power of 2, returns log2(n) (i.e., the exponent); otherwise returns 0.
      static boolean isConstAndVar​(Symbol s0, Symbol s1, Symbol s2)
      Returns true if the three symbols are LDCINT, LDLADDR, and LOADW.
      static boolean isTwoConstInts​(Symbol s1, Symbol s2)
      Returns true if both symbols are LDCINT

        public static byte getShiftAmount​(int n)
